game.name: Wheelie Cross
game.description:
It is time to tell all the bikers of the city that you are not less than anyone else! Grab your bike and get ready to do wheelies on the multiple types of bikes in Wheelie Cross! We know that handling this task requires an expertise in bike manoeuvring. And, your insane bike driving abilities and amazing focus skills have encouraged you to accept this challenge today. Your objective in this brand new racing game is to keep the balance of your motor vehicle. 
There are plenty of obstacles you have to deal with along the way. Put your insane driving skills to the test to perform the longest wheelie ever! Try to grab as many coins as possible to unlock new bike models in this one of the best bike games for boys! Choose from multiple motorbike options like a superbike, a vintage bike, an ATV, a scooter, a futuristic motorcycle, a steam-punk model, a real chopper, a unicorn ride, or a trial bike! 
You need to be careful all the time since the path is full of bumpy ramps that will try to stop you from moving forward. Put your eyes on the screen to complete each track as fast as possible in this side-scrolling bike riding game! Get the best time record in each track by reaching the checkered flag as fast as possible! This super fun bike driving game features cool bike models, side-scrolling camera view, easy controls and colourful graphics. Good luck to create your best high score in each level of this endless wheelie bike game! Play more online uphill racing games for free on atmegame.com!
